items.sentence: How did you know I was going to ask you for that?
Tom doesn\'t usually stop if the light is yellow.
Are you sure it was Tom who told Mary to do that?
I feel more alert after drinking a cup of coffee.
I found it impossible to get in contact with him.
I gathered from what she said that she liked him.
I had known her for ten years when I married her.
We can\'t even be certain that it was Tom we saw.
We can\'t open this envelope until Tom gets here.
Tom finished his drink and asked for another one.
First, we\'re all going to have something to eat.
Do you think you can really sing better than Tom?
Do you want to go out and get something to drink?
Does Tom know what Mary is going to do next year?
Tom has two sisters. Both of them live in Boston.
Tom moved into his new apartment on October 20th.
Tom says that he heard a similar story from Mary.
Are you doing something special on your birthday?
Are you still thinking about applying to Harvard?
I think it would be a good idea to go home early.
Don\'t do that unless Tom says you have to do it.
I wasn\'t the only one who didn\'t eat breakfast.
Tom told me later that he wasn\'t really married.
I haven\'t eaten anything in the past three days.
Why wouldn\'t you let me get a driver\'s license?
Without Tom\'s help, we couldn\'t have done that.
I wonder what the advantage of this technique is.
I asked Tom if he wanted to go to Boston with me.
I asked Tom when he was planning to go to Boston.
Tom had a lot of time to think about the problem.
Tom looked after our dog while we were in Boston.
I hope that you\'ll be able to come to the party.
I knew Tom wouldn\'t be able to guess the answer.
I asked Tom if he knew anybody who taught French.
I didn\'t think anyone still lived in this house.
I don\'t know whether Tom believes in God or not.
Tom wanted to help Mary, but he didn\'t know how.
I don\'t think Tom will ever come back to Boston.
I don\'t think Tom will help me with my homework.
I don\'t think Tom would mind it if you did that.
I don\'t think that Tom could do that by himself.
Tom regrets the decision he made late last night.
Tom rode his motorcycle across the United States.
Are both of your sisters as beautiful as you are?
I had no choice but to do what Tom told me to do.
I had no idea that Tom knew so much about zebras.
I have to take the entrance examination tomorrow.
Don\'t think you\'re going to get away with that.
This is the most difficult book I have ever read.
Tom doesn\'t always understand what\'s happening.
